55 and it says ho everyone that thirsts
come ye to the waters and he that has no

wine and milk without money and without
price wherefore do you spend money for
that which is not bread and your labor
for that which satisfies not hearken
diligently unto me and i--i that which
is good and let your soul the light
itself in fatness so many times we're
seeking after things even as believers
doing things maybe even in the ministry
that don't have anything to do with Yas
presence with his presence his presence
is free although it does come with a

doing all we can to seek him first to
seek his kingdom first and to do those
things which cultivate his presence
yahshua's presence in our lives because
that's the only thing that will keep us
going it's the only thing that will

having his presence in our lives so if
we're busy with other things that are
not allowing his presence in our lives
we need to get out of those things and
return to the simplicity of just crying

ends the

what Yahshua HaMashiach offers us he who

his presence and not going after things
